item.title: Hundreds evacuated and dozens hospitalized after an ammonia gas leak in Oklahoma
item.description: Authorities have evacuated hundreds from a city in Oklahoma after a tanker truck spewed anhydrous ammonia gas in a hotel parking lot

item.title: Oklahoma is set to execute a man after a state panel recommended his life be spared
item.description: Oklahoma is preparing to execute a man after a state panel recommended his life be spared

item.title: FAA says flight cuts will stay at 6% because more air traffic controllers are coming to work
item.description: The Federal Aviation Administration says flight cuts will stay at 6% because more air traffic controllers are coming to work
